bookmark.content: MBC, successfully hard-forked at Bitcoin's 525,000th block level as of May 2018, is a peer-to-peer payment protocol with a very low transaction fee of 0.0001% compared to Bitcoin and a significant increase in transaction rate per second. After said hard-fork,… [+3393 chars]
bookmark.description: SEOUL, South Korea, Oct. 7, 2019 /PRNewswire/ -- MicroBitCoin (MBC), first Bitcoin hard-forking cryptocurrency in Korea, is launching new network with massive upgrade in October 2019. MBC, successfully hard-forked at Bitcoin's 525,000th block level as of May …
bookmark.title: MICROBITCOIN, New Network Launch with Massive Upgrade in October 2019
